languages.text: В час измены Вольного Торговца хормейстер Заккари Вайс пребывал в своей капелле. Много дней до того он вслушивался в варп, силясь разобрать неуловимый голос, звучащий в Имматериуме. Он испытывал странную уверенность, что обязан расслышать и расшифровать это послание. В миг, когда на флагмане объявили тревогу, он наконец услышал — услышал собственный голос, кричащий об измене Лорд-капитана. Коварные течения Эмпирея подхватили его слова, сказанные в будущем, и унесли в прошлое. Осознавая, что безнадежно опоздал, Вайс закричал в варп изо всех сил. Он надеялся, что в этот раз ему удастся предостеречь себя прошлого.

The hour of the Rogue Trader's treason found Zacchary Weisz in his chapel. He had been listening to the warp for many days, trying to discern an elusive voice speaking from the Immaterium. He felt an odd certainty that he had to hear and decipher that message. The moment the alarm was raised on the flagship, he heard it at last. It was his own voice shouting about the Lord Captain's betrayal. The Empyrean's insidious currents had seized his yet-to-be-spoken words and carried them into the past. Realising that he was hopelessly late, Weisz shouted into the warp as loudly as he could. He prayed that this time he would succeed in warning his past self.
languages.original_text: В час измены Вольного Торговца хормейстер Заккари Вайс пребывал в своей капелле. Много дней до того он вслушивался в варп, силясь разобрать неуловимый голос, звучащий в Имматериуме. Он испытывал странную уверенность, что обязан расслышать и расшифровать это послание. traits.locale_text: The hour of the Rogue Trader's treachery found Zacchary Weisz in his chapel. He'd been listening to the warp for many days, trying to discern an elusive voice speaking from the Immaterium. He felt an odd certainty that he had to hear and decipher that message. The moment alarm was raised on the flagship, he heard it at last. It was his own voice shouting about the Lord Captain's betrayal. The Empyrean's tortuous currents had seized his yet-to-be-spoken words and carried them into the past. Realising he was desperately late, Weisz shouted into the warp as loudly as he could. He hoped this time he'd succeed in warning his past self.

languages.text: Der Verrat {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} erreichte Zacchary Weisz in seiner Kapelle. Er hatte viele Tage lang dem Warp gelauscht und versucht, die schwer fassbare Stimme aus dem Immaterium zu erkennen. Er hatte das untrügliche Gefühl, diese Nachricht entschlüsseln zu müssen. Als an Bord des Flaggschiffs Alarm ausgelöst wurde, hörte er sie endlich. Es war seine eigene Stimme, die den Verrat des Lord Captains beklagte! Die heimtückischen Strömungen des Empyreums hatten sich seiner noch nicht ausgesprochenen Worte bedient und sie in die Vergangenheit getragen. Als er erkannte, dass er viel zu spät kam, brüllte Weisz so laut er konnte in den Warp. Er betete, dass es ihm diesmal gelingen würde, sein vergangenes Selbst zu warnen.
languages.original_text: The hour of the Rogue Trader's treason found Zacchary Weisz in his chapel. He had been listening to the warp for many days, trying to discern an elusive voice speaking from the Immaterium. He felt an odd certainty that he had to hear and decipher that message. The moment the alarm was raised on the flagship, he heard it at last. It was his own voice shouting about the Lord Captain's betrayal. The Empyrean's insidious currents had seized his yet-to-be-spoken words and carried them into the past. Realising that he was hopelessly late, Weisz shouted into the warp as loudly as he could. He prayed that this time he would succeed in warning his past self.

traits.locale_text: Der Verrat {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} erreichte Zacchary Weisz in seiner Kapelle. Er hatte viele Tage lang dem Warp gelauscht und versucht, die schwer fassbare Stimme aus dem Immaterium zu erkennen. Er hatte das untrügliche Gefühl, diese Nachricht entschlüsseln zu müssen. Als an Bord des Flaggschiffs Alarm ausgelöst wurde, hörte er sie endlich. Es war seine eigene Stimme, die den Verrat des Lord Captains beklagte! Die heimtückischen Strömungen des Empyreums hatten sich seiner noch nicht ausgesprochenen Worte bedient und sie in die Vergangenheit getragen. Als er erkannte, dass er viel zu spät kam, brüllte Weisz so laut er konnte in den Warp. Er betete, dass es ihm diesmal gelingen würde, sein vergangenes Selbst zu warnen.

languages.text: À l'heure où la trahison {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} éclata au grand jour, Zacchary Weisz se trouvait dans sa chapelle, où il écoutait le Warp depuis des jours afin de discerner une voix insaisissable émanant de l'Immaterium. Il éprouvait l'étrange certitude de devoir entendre et déchiffrer son message. À l'instant où l'alerte fut donnée à bord du vaisseau amiral, il parvint enfin à l'entendre. C'était sa propre voix, qui dénonçait à grands cris la félonie {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}. Les courants insidieux de l'Empyrée s'étaient saisis de ses propos et les avaient catapultés dans le passé avant même qu'il ne les formule. Comprenant qu'il avait un train de retard, Weisz projeta sa voix dans le Warp de toutes ses forces, en priant pour réussir cette fois-ci à avertir son alter ego du passé.
languages.original_text: The hour of the Rogue Trader's treason found Zacchary Weisz in his chapel. He had been listening to the warp for many days, trying to discern an elusive voice speaking from the Immaterium. He felt an odd certainty that he had to hear and decipher that message. The moment the alarm was raised on the flagship, he heard it at last. It was his own voice shouting about the Lord Captain's betrayal. The Empyrean's insidious currents had seized his yet-to-be-spoken words and carried them into the past. Realising that he was hopelessly late, Weisz shouted into the warp as loudly as he could. He prayed that this time he would succeed in warning his past self.

languages.text: Cuando llegó la hora de la traición de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán, Zacchary Weisz estaba en la capilla. Llevaba varios días escuchando la disformidad, intentando discernir una voz esquiva que le hablaba desde el Inmaterio. Tenía la extraña certeza de que debía escuchar y descifrar el mensaje. Cuando la alarma sonó por la nave insignia, por fin lo comprendió. Era su propia voz la que le alertaba de la traición de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán. Las traicioneras corrientes del Empíreo habían robado las palabras que aún no había pronunciado y las habían enviado al pasado. Sabiendo que ya era demasiado tarde, Weisz gritó a la disformidad con todas sus fuerzas. Rezó para que en esta ocasión el mensaje llegara a tiempo a su yo pasado.
languages.original_text: The hour of the Rogue Trader's treason found Zacchary Weisz in his chapel. languages.text: ローグトレーダーが反逆を起こしたその時、ザッカリー・ワイズは礼拝堂にいた。彼は何日もの間、<歪み>へと耳を傾け、非物質世界から聞こえてくるつかみどころのない声を聞き取ろうとしていたのだ。彼にはそのメッセージを聞いて解読しなければならないと、奇妙な確信があったのだ。旗艦に警報が鳴り響いた瞬間、彼はついに聞き取った。それは、ロード・キャプテンの裏切りを叫ぶ自身の声だった。エンピリアンの狡猾な流れが、彼がまだ口にしてさえいなかった言葉を捕らえ、過去へと運んでいったのだ。絶望的な遅れを悟り、ワイズは<歪み>へと向かって出せるだけの大声で叫ぶ。今度こそ、過去の自分への警告が成功するようにと祈りながら。
languages.original_text: The hour of the Rogue Trader's treason found Zacchary Weisz in his chapel. He had been listening to the warp for many days, trying to discern an elusive voice speaking from the Immaterium. He felt an odd certainty that he had to hear and decipher that message. The moment the alarm was raised on the flagship, he heard it at last. It was his own voice shouting about the Lord Captain's betrayal. The Empyrean's insidious currents had seized his yet-to-be-spoken words and carried them into the past. Realising that he was hopelessly late, Weisz shouted into the warp as loudly as he could. He prayed that this time he would succeed in warning his past self.

traits.locale_text: ローグトレーダーが反逆を起こしたその時、ザッカリー・ワイズは礼拝堂にいた。彼は何日もの間、<歪み>へと耳を傾け、非物質世界から聞こえてくるつかみどころのない声を聞き取ろうとしていたのだ。彼にはそのメッセージを聞いて解読しなければならないと、奇妙な確信があったのだ。旗艦に警報が鳴り響いた瞬間、彼はついに聞き取った。それは、ロード・キャプテンの裏切りを叫ぶ自身の声だった。エンピリアンの狡猾な流れが、彼がまだ口にしてさえいなかった言葉を捕らえ、過去へと運んでいったのだ。絶望的な遅れを悟り、ワイズは<歪み>へと向かって出せるだけの大声で叫ぶ。今度こそ、過去の自分への警告が成功するようにと祈りながら。

languages.text: 行商浪人叛变的时候，扎卡里·威茨待在他自己的礼拜堂里。很长时间以来，他一直在聆听亚空间的声音，试图分辨其中某个难以捉摸的声音。他心中带着古怪的预感——他必须想办法聆听、破译这个声音。当旗舰的警报响起的那一刻，他终于听清了那个声音：那是他自己的声音，高声呼喊着行商浪人的背叛行为。至高天难以捉摸的暗潮攫住了这句他没来得及出口的话，把它带到了过去。那一刻，威茨意识到他的预言终究还是太迟了。他用尽全身的力量，尽可能地对着亚空间高声喊叫，祈祷这一次能成功地警告过去的自己。
languages.original_text: The hour of the Rogue Trader's treason found Zacchary Weisz in his chapel. He had been listening to the warp for many days, trying to discern an elusive voice speaking from the Immaterium. He felt an odd certainty that he had to hear and decipher that message. The moment the alarm was raised on the flagship, he heard it at last. It was his own voice shouting about the Lord Captain's betrayal. The Empyrean's insidious currents had seized his yet-to-be-spoken words and carried them into the past. Realising that he was hopelessly late, Weisz shouted into the warp as loudly as he could. He prayed that this time he would succeed in warning his past self.

languages.text: Hür Tacir'in ihaneti, Zacchary Weisz'ın şapelde bulunduğu anı yakaladı. Günlerini öteboyutu dinleyerek geçiriyor, Tindiyar'dan gelen anlaşılması güç konuşmaları kavramaya çalışıyordu. O mesajı duyup deşifre etmesi gerektiğine dair tuhaf bir kesinlik hissetti. Sancak gemisinde alarmın çalmaya başladığı o an, mesajı son kez duydu. İşittiği, Lord Kaptan'ın ihanetini çığıran kendi sesiydi. Gök Diyar'ın sinsi akımları, henüz edilmemiş sözleri yakalayarak geçmişe taşımıştı. Çaresizlik bir şekilde her şey için çok geç kaldığını fark eden Weisz, öteboyuta doğru avazı çıktığı kadar bağırdı. Bu sefer geçmişteki hâlini uyarabilmek için dua etti.
languages.original_text: The hour of the Rogue Trader's treason found Zacchary Weisz in his chapel. He had been listening to the warp for many days, trying to discern an elusive voice speaking from the Immaterium. He felt an odd certainty that he had to hear and decipher that message. The moment the alarm was raised on the flagship, he heard it at last. It was his own voice shouting about the Lord Captain's betrayal. The Empyrean's insidious currents had seized his yet-to-be-spoken words and carried them into the past. Realising that he was hopelessly late, Weisz shouted into the warp as loudly as he could. He prayed that this time he would succeed in warning his past self.
